p: Dry samples (0.5 g) were homogenized in the extraction buffer (1 mL) containing; EDTA (1 mM), PVP (1%) and sodium phosphate buffer (50 mM, pH = 7) by mortar and pestle. Afterwards, the homogenates were centrifuged (Eppendorf centrifuge 5430R) at 10,000 g for 15 min. Finally, the supernatant fractions were utilized for the measurement of protein content and enzyme activities [ 20].
